title: Resolvtions and decisions of divers practicall cases of conscience in continuall use amongst men very necessary for their information and direction in these evil times, in four decades / by Jos. Hall ...
author: Hall, Joseph, 1574-1656.
notes: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
"An advertisement to the reader": p. [2]-[6] at end.
Attributed to Joseph Hall. cf. BM.
